title: [PATCH]: GSOC HMR Page route change top scrollheight location
author: Circuit-Overtime

gist.summary: Implemented automatic scroll-to-top behavior on route changes in the GSoC app and updated project timeline details.
gist.impact: Visitors to the Google Summer of Code page will experience smoother navigation with pages starting at the top.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee helping a student character navigate a long vertical map or scroll, ensuring they start at the top. Represents the scroll-to-top fix.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee helping a tiny pixel student roll up a long scrolling map to the top. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Represents smooth navigation. Nostalgic but beautiful.
